div.script: var photoGallery14315= {"Album": {"title":"Photo Gallery 1500PX X 1000PX","description":"","transitiondelay":"3","fadestyle":"NO","gallerywidth":"1500","backgroundaudio":"/cms/lib/WV01000015/Centricity/ModuleInstance/14266/","loopaudio":"False","lgpath":"/cms/lib/WV01000015/Centricity/ModuleInstance/14266/large/","tnpath":"/cms/lib/WV01000015/Centricity/ModuleInstance/14266/thumbs/","Images": [{"photoname":"SLS Food Delivery","src":"SLS Food Delivery.JPG?rnd=0.431360788844228","caption":"Staff at Short Line School load a bus with food and instructional materials for delivery.","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"NMS Meal Preparation","src":"NMS Meal Preparation.JPG?rnd=0.156028608398525","caption":"These meals will be delivered along bus routes.","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"WCS Staff Helping Students","src":"WCS Staff Helping Students.jpg?rnd=0.293928189340014","caption":"WCS Staff cleaned schools and buses. Cooks prepared meals for our students.","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Strategic Planning Training","src":"Strategic Planning Training.jpeg?rnd=0.751257541939271","caption":"WCS Employees engaged in Strategic Planning Training from the WVDE","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"WCTEC Blood Drive","src":"WCTEC Blood Drive.JPG?rnd=0.0193079966210332","caption":"WCTEC students in the Diagnostic Services program recently hosted a blood drive.","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"WV History Bowl SLS","src":"WV History Bowl SLS.jpg?rnd=0.740309559619198","caption":"Several students from Short Line School competed in the West Virginia History Bowl","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"Honorary Secretaries of State","src":"Honorary Secretaries of State.jpeg?rnd=0.569464113828477","caption":"Logan Norris and Matthew Riley are honored by the BOE for serving as honorary Secretaries of State","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"VHS Innovation Showcase","src":"VHS Innovation Showcase.JPG?rnd=0.404381470011725","caption":"Students, teacher, and community members who were part of the Innovation Showcase at Valley High School. The students presented their solutions to local issues.","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"PCES Breakout Session","src":"PCES Breakout Session.jpeg?rnd=0.096924614206387","caption":"As a reward for meeting their reading goal, PCES students used their critical and creative thinking, collaboration, and communication skills to solve digital and physical breakouts. Students utilized their social emotional learning skills of self awareness, self-management, social awareness, relationship, and responsible decision making skills while having fun.","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"},{"photoname":"HHS Skype Session With Senator Manchin","src":"HHS Skype Session With Senator Manchin.JPG?rnd=0.611952990578466","caption":"Students at HHS had the opportunity to speak with Senator Manchin via Skype. The students were able to ask questions of the Senator.","pause":"","link":"","target":"_self"}]}}
